title: Gambling and Long Lost Dads
teaser:
A professional blackjack player faces down his gambling demons; a young woman meets her brother for the first time at their father's funeral;  and Colin Quinn (Weekend Update, SNL) is hired to do comedy for Robert DeNiro's birthday party...and bombs.

Hosted by comic and author Mike Birbiglia ("Sleepwalk with Me"). The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.
contentencoded:
Josh Axelrad - A blackjack player faces his demons.
 
Daisy Rosario - A young woman meets her brother for the first time at their father's funeral. 
 
Colin Quinn - Is hired to do comedy at Robert Deniro's birthday party...and bombs.
 
Hosted by comic, author and Moth regular, Mike Birbiglia.
